title: "Magnetic Preparation and Treatment of Objects and Animals"
first_phrase: In this last part of the text, the focus shifts to the practical application of magnetism in healing, particularly through the preparation and magnetization of various objects. The instructions for both negative and positive magnetization are given, along with tips on how to increase the potency of the magnetized objects. Additionally, the text touches on the topic of animal healing, emphasizing the gratefulness of pets for magnetic treatments. It is suggested to use caution when treating animals and to take into account the polarity of the animal's energy. Overall, this section provides practical advice for those looking to incorporate magnetic healing into their practice.
